revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [(Col.) 189];;(On the 1st or 2nd of Hathyr, continued);Karanos, son of Orsenouphis and Tapetsiris, grandson of Imouthes: [- - -];Chairemon, son of Pasoxis and Tanephremmis, grandson of Pasoxis, [for ch(--): - - -];Achillas, son of Heron and Didyme, grandson of Orsenouphis, [for ch(--): - - -];Apynchis, son of Pnepheros and Tasoucharion, grandson of Pakysis, [for ch(--): - - -];Ptolemaios, son of Leonides and Tapetheus, grandson of Papeis: [- - -];Total for the day: 32 drachmai 5 obols.;;On the 3rd, similarly:;Ninis, son of Asklas and Tabous, grandson of Ninis, [for ch(--): - - -];Horos, son of Petaus and Tauris, grandson of Petaus, for ch(--): [- - -];Total for the day: 4 drachmai [. . obols].;;On the 4th, similarly:;Phaesis, son of Heras and Isidora, grandson of Orsenouphis, [for ch(--): - - -];Esouris, son of Kames and Thaesis, grandson of Heras, for ch(--): [- - -];Total for the day: 4 drachmai 20 obols.;;[On the . .], similarly:;Patron, son of Sokmenis and Taonnophris, grandson of Sokmenis, [for ch(--): - - -];Ptolemaios, son of Apynchis and Tapetheus, grandson of Aunes, for ch(--): [- - -];Euemeros, son of Neilos and Taeuemeros, grandson of Euemeros, [for ch(--): - - -];Total for the day: 8 drachmai 20 obols.;;[On the . .], similarly:;Petheus, son of Didymos and Tauris, grandson of Maron, [for ch(--): - - -];Euemeros, son of Euemeros and Tauris, grandson of Kera, [for ch(--): - - -];Total for the day: 4 drachmai 11 obols.;;[On the . .], similarly:;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus and [Tapsais], grandson of Phanomgeus, [for ch(--): - - -];[Petheus], son of Nestosiris and [Thermouthis], grandson of Petheus, [for ch(--): - - -];[Mysthes], son of Petheus and Tasoucharion, grandson of Mysthes(?): [- - -];Total for the day: 4 drachmai 11(?) obols

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC - Pearl OM, PMich IV/2, 358G (= col. [189]), l. 1-29, 1939
